EMAILCONTENTS.SUBJECT: Password Reset
EMAILCONTENTS.BODY:
Dear $!do.getApplicantName(), 


Congratulation,

Your new password is : $!do.getNewPassword(). Please login with this key and change the password by using change password

Regards,
$!do.getErpName() Team

EMAILCONTENTS.SUBJECT: Login Credential
EMAILCONTENTS.BODY:
Dear $!do.getUserName(), 

Greetings from $!do.getErpName() Team.

Your login credential has been generated. Your UserName is : $!do.getUserId() and Password is : $!do.getNewPassword(). Please login with this password.

For details, kindly login to $!do.getErpName() portal.

Regards,
$!do.getErpName() Team
